text: Roger Federer was the two-time defending champion, but lost in the fourth round to Guillermo Cañas. Tenth-seeded Novak Djokovic won the title, defeating Guillermo Cañas 6–3, 6–2, 6–4 in the final for his first victory at the Masters 1000 level. ==Seeds== All thirty-two seeds received a bye to the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ===Bottom Half=== ====Section 5==== ====Section 6==== ====Section 7==== ====Section 8==== ==External links== * Men's Singles draw Category:2007 Sony Ericsson Open Sony Ericsson Open
title: 2007 Sony Ericsson Open – Men's Singles
